briefdescription.para: Get the sycl::queue object that is currently activated for this thread.
Get the number of activated queues not including the global or default queue.

detaileddescription.para: Returns inside the number of activated queues not including the global queue (QMgrHelper::active_queues[0]).

briefdescription.para: Get the number of available queues for given backend and device type combination.

detaileddescription.para: Returns the number of available queues for a specific backend and device type combination.

briefdescription.para: Get a sycl::queue object of the specified type and device id.

detaileddescription.para: Returns a copy of a sycl::queue corresponding to the specified device type and device number. A runtime_error gets thrown if no such device exists.

briefdescription.para: Returns True if the passed in queue and the current queue are the same, else returns False.

parameterdescription.para: An opaque pointer to a sycl::queue.

simplesect.para: True or False depending on whether the QRef argument is the same as the currently activated queue.

briefdescription.para: Pops the top of stack element from DPPL's stack of activated sycl::queue objects.
Pushes a new sycl::queue object to the top of DPPL's thread-local stack of a "activated" queues, and returns a copy of the queue to caller.
Set the default DPPL queue to the sycl::queue for the given backend and device type combination and return a DPPLSyclQueueRef for that queue. If no queue was created Null is returned to caller.

detaileddescription.para: The function sets the global queue, i.e., the sycl::queue object at QMgrHelper::active_queues[0] vector to the sycl::queue corresponding to the specified device type and id. If not queue was found for the backend and device, Null is returned.
This file implements the data types and functions declared in dppl_sycl_queue_manager.h.
